bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of gan 疳 , gan -illness, with emaciation, desiccation, abdominal fullness, vexation, and heat . Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 74: 血氣減損，不榮肌肉，而柴辟羸露，其腑臟 之不宣，則噏噏苦熱，謂之哺露也 , “When blood and qi are diminished and harmed, and cannot nourish muscles and flesh any longer, with emaciation to the bones and the depots and palaces fail to transmit, and eventually one has a slight feeling of heat, this is called ‘ breastfeeding-period emaciation ’”.
